questions.question: What is the approximate compression of the Earth?
A Graticule is the name given to:
options: a series of lines drawn on a chart
a series of Latitude and Longitude lines drawn on a chart or map
a selection of small circles as you get nearer to either pole
questions.solution: a series of Latitude and Longitude lines drawn on a chart or map
